title: Roasted cauliflower and lentil salad with red pepper sauce
description: This hearty, spiced vegan salad with a rich, tangy dressing is full of goodness and perfect for winter.This meal provides 552 kcal, 29g protein, 57g carbohydrate (of which 9g sugars), 23g fat (of which 5g saturates), 11g fibre and 0.4g salt per portion.
ingredients: 1 large cauliflower (approximately 550g/1lb 4oz), outer leaves and stalk removed, separated into equal-sized florets
pinch sea salt flakes, or to taste
handful finely chopped fresh flatleaf parsley
1 large red pepper, preferably Romano, stalk and seeds removed, cut lengthways into quarters
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
